snippet: An exhibition pays tribute to Diane von Furstenberg’s wrap, which introduced a new way to dress.
abstract: Exhibition at May Company Wilshire Building in Los Angeles celebrating 40th birthday of Diane von Furstenberg's emblematic wrap dress draws celebrities inspired by the fashion designer and her iconic style.
lead_paragraph: An exhibition pays tribute to Diane von Furstenberg’s wrap, which introduced a new way to dress.

headline.seo: The Diane von Furstenberg Wrap Dress Remains a Fashion Statement
headline.main: The Dress Heard Round the World
headline.print_headline: The Dress Heard Round the World
